title: Augmented Reality-Based Science Class Design and Application: Pre-Service Teacher Capacity Building Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theories and elementary science subject knowledge
context.additional_context: A course focused on pre-service teachers developing science lesson design and implementation competencies using augmented reality technology, with the goal of enhancing professionalism through peer collaboration and reflective activities

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete science experiment design and simulation projects using augmented reality tools
Learners can develop elementary science curriculum-integrated lesson plans applying a learning theory-based augmented reality instructional design framework
Learners can design and implement formative assessment tools to evaluate the effectiveness of augmented reality-based science classes through collaboration

resources: AR Authoring Tools (e.g., Unity MARS, ZapWorks)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
